fields.label: Tradition
fields.description: The ancient traditions of worship and sacrifice must be preserved and upheld. (Lawful)

fields.label: Clarity
fields.description: I always try to help those in need, no matter what the personal cost. (Good)

fields.label: Change
fields.description: We must help bring about the changes the gods are constantly working in the world. (Chaotic)

fields.label: Power
fields.description: I hope to one day rise to the top of my faith’s religious hierarchy. (Lawful)

fields.label: Faith
fields.description: I trust that my deity will guide my actions, I have faith that if I work hard, things will go well. (Lawful)

fields.label: Aspiration
fields.description: I seek to prove myself worthy of my god’s favor by matching my actions against his or her teachings. (Any)

fields.label: Independence
fields.description: I am a free spirit— no one tells me what to do. (Chaotic)

fields.label: Fairness
fields.description: I never target people who can’t afford to lose a few coins. (Lawful)

fields.label: Charity
fields.description: I distribute the money I acquire to the people who really need it. (Good)

fields.label: Creativity
fields.description: I never run the same con twice. (Chaotic)

fields.label: Friendship
fields.description: Material goods come and go. Bonds of friendship last forever. (Good)

fields.label: Aspiration
fields.description: I’m determined to make something of myself. (Any)

fields.label: Honor
fields.description: I don’t steal from others in the trade. (Lawful)

fields.label: Freedom
fields.description: Chains are meant to be broken, as are those who would forge them. (Chaotic)

fields.label: Charity
fields.description: I steal from the wealthy so that I can help people in need. (Good)

fields.label: Greed
fields.description: I will do whatever it takes to become wealthy. (Evil)

fields.label: People
fields.description: I’m loyal to my friends, not to any ideals, and everyone else can take a trip down the Styx for all I care. (Neutral)

fields.label: Redemption
fields.description: There’s a spark of good in everyone. (Good)

fields.label: Beauty
fields.description: When I perform, I make the world better than it was. (Good)

fields.label: Tradition
fields.description: The stories, legends, and songs of the past must never be forgotten, for they teach us who we are. (Lawful)

fields.label: Creativity
fields.description: The world is in need of new ideas and bold action. (Chaotic)

fields.label: Greed
fields.description: I’m only in it for the money and fame. (Evil)

fields.label: People
fields.description: I like seeing the smiles on people’s faces when I perform. That’s all that matters. (Neutral

fields.label: Honesty
fields.description: Art should reflect the soul; it should come from within and reveal who we really are. (Any)

fields.label: Respect
fields.description: People deserve to be treated with dignity and respect. (Good)

fields.label: Fairness
fields.description: No one should get preferential treatment before the law, and no one is above the law. (Lawful)

fields.label: Freedom
fields.description: . Tyrants must not be allowed to oppress the people. (Chaotic)

fields.label: Might
fields.description: If I become strong, I can take what I want— what I deserve. (Evil)

fields.label: Sincerity
fields.description: There’s no good in pretending to be something I’m not. (Neutral)

fields.label: Destiny
fields.description: Nothing and no one can steer me away from my higher calling. (Any)

fields.label: Community
fields.description: It is the duty of all civilized people to strengthen the bonds of community and the security of civilization. (Lawful)

fields.label: Generosity
fields.description: My talents were given to me so that I could use them to benefit the world. (Good)

fields.label: Freedom
fields.description: Everyone should be free to pursue his or her own livelihood. (Chaotic)

fields.label: Greed
fields.description: I’m only in it for the money. (Evil)

fields.label: People
fields.description: I’m committed to the people I care about, not to ideals. (Neutral)

fields.label: Aspiration
fields.description: I work hard to be the best there is at my craft.

fields.label: Greater Good
fields.description: My gifts are meant to be shared with all, not used for my own benefit. (Good)

fields.label: Logic
fields.description: Emotions must not cloud our sense of what is right and true, or our logical thinking. (Lawful)

fields.label: Free Thinking
fields.description: Inquiry and curiosity are the pillars of progress. (Chaotic)

fields.label: Power
fields.description: Solitude and contemplation are paths toward mystical or magical power. (Evil)

fields.label: Live and Let Live
fields.description: Meddling in the affairs of others only causes trouble. (Neutral)

fields.label: Self-Knowlegde
fields.description: If you know yourself, there’s nothing left to know. (Any)

fields.label: Respect
fields.description: Respect is due to me because of my position, but all people regardless of station deserve to be treated with dignity. (Good)

fields.label: Responsibility
fields.description: It is my duty to respect the authority of those above me, just as those below me must respect mine. (Lawful)

fields.label: Independence
fields.description: I must prove that I can handle myself without the coddling of my family. (Chaotic)

fields.label: Power
fields.description: If I can attain more power, no one will tell me what to do. (Evil)

fields.label: Family
fields.description: Blood runs thicker than water. (Any)

fields.label: Noble Obligation
fields.description: It is my duty to protect and care for the people beneath me. (Good)

fields.label: Change
fields.description: Life is like the seasons, in constant change, and we must change with it. (Chaotic)

fields.label: Greater Good
fields.description: It is each person’s responsibility to make the most happiness for the whole tribe. (Good)

fields.label: Honor
fields.description: If I dishonor myself, I dishonor my whole clan. (Lawful)

fields.label: Might
fields.description: The strongest are meant to rule. (Evil)

fields.label: Nature
fields.description: The natural world is more important than all the constructs of civilization. (Neutral)

fields.label: Glory
fields.description: I must earn glory in battle, for myself and my clan. (Any)

fields.label: Knowledge
fields.description: The path to power and self-improvement is through knowledge. (Neutral)

fields.label: Beauty
fields.description: What is beautiful points us beyond itself toward what is true. (Good)

fields.label: Logic
fields.description: Emotions must not cloud our logical thinking. (Lawful)

fields.label: No Limits
fields.description: Nothing should fetter the infinite possibility inherent in all existence. (Chaotic)

fields.label: Power
fields.description: Knowledge is the path to power and domination. (Evil)

fields.label: Self-Improvement
fields.description: The goal of a life of study is the betterment of oneself. (Any)

fields.label: Respect
fields.description: The thing that keeps a ship together is mutual respect between captain and crew. (Good)

fields.label: Fairness
fields.description: We all do the work, so we all share in the rewards. (Lawful)

fields.label: Freedom
fields.description: The sea is freedom— the freedom to go anywhere and do anything. (Chaotic)

fields.label: Mastery
fields.description: I’m a predator, and the other ships on the sea are my prey. (Evil)

fields.label: People
fields.description: I’m committed to my crewmates, not to ideals. (Neutral)

fields.label: Aspiration
fields.description: Someday I’ll own my own ship and chart my own destiny. (Any)

fields.label: Greater Good
fields.description: Our lot is to lay down our lives in defense of others. (Good)

fields.label: Responsibility
fields.description: I do what I must and obey just authority. (Lawful)

fields.label: Independence
fields.description: When people follow orders blindly, they embrace a kind of tyranny. (Chaotic)

fields.label: Might
fields.description: In life as in war, the stronger force wins. (Evil)

fields.label: Live and Let Live
fields.description: Ideals aren’t worth killing over or going to war for. (Neutral)

fields.label: Nation
fields.description: My city, nation, or people are all that matter. (Any)

fields.label: Respect
fields.description: All people, rich or poor, deserve respect. (Good)

fields.label: Community
fields.description: We have to take care of each other, because no one else is going to do it. (Lawful)

fields.label: Change
fields.description: The low are lifted up, and the high and mighty are brought down. Change is the nature of things. (Chaotic)

fields.label: Retribution
fields.description: The rich need to be shown what life and death are like in the gutters. (Evil)

fields.label: People
fields.description: I help the people who help me— that’s what keeps us alive. (Neutral)

fields.label: Aspiration
fields.description: I'm going to prove that I'm worthy of a better life.
